name: Fruit Memory Match
description:
=> Fruit Memory Match game for kids which help develop memory skills of children.
=> Playing this fruits matching game with your kids will help them improve their recognition while having fun.
=> fruits memory game is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. Both, boys and girls will love this game.

Features of fruits memory games for kids:

1. Arcade Level
2. Timing Level
3. Prophet Level

=> Arcade Level To Play Unlimited In This Game.
=> Timing Level Thats are Timing To Match a Animal Card.
=> Prophet Level is Combination Of Timing and Arcade Level.

- Colorful HD graphic designed for toddlers
- Sound settings to adjust or even on/off game sounds and music
- Visual memory training
- It helps kids to recognize and teach different fruits
- Matching game is designed and structured according to kid's mentality


Have fun to play with our matching game!
